name: Virtual Violin 2.0
description:
Avoid that dreaded "0" on your next at home playing test because you .... forgot ... your instrument.

(Re) Introducing Virtual Violin 2.0 (1.0 is on Unity's website).

Your music from class is here. 

*NOTE* Make sure to make it full screen. 

*NOTE* Play the first note if there's more than one note. Bonus points if you have a touch screen and can play them all.
